vlive.korean: 하삐 님께서는 "물방울 떨어지는 소리 밖에 나가서 마이크 대면 되는 거 아닌가요?" Habbi, "Why don't you put the mic out because it is raining outside?" 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] UP10TION X LieV - 업텐션의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Habbi, "Why don't you put the mic out because it is raining outside?"

vlive.korean: "저 대휘 오빠 보고 작곡에 흥미가 생겼어요 어디서부터 손을 대면 좋을까요?" "Seeing you, I've come to take interest in writing songs. Where should I start"? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 오랜만이야 ABNEW🥰
vlive.english: "Seeing you, I've come to take interest in writing songs. Where should I start"?

vlive.korean: [적응왕] 등만 대면 자니까... [Kind of Adjusting] Since I sleep as soon as my back is down... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [INFINITE] 우리 사랑둥이 또또우! 둥근달빛 19번 보고난 뒤 다시 만나자💖 (Jang Dong Woo’s farewell message)
vlive.english: [Kind of Adjusting] Since I sleep as soon as my back is down...

vlive.korean: 이렇게 하시고 바로 눈에 갖다 대면 화상 입을 수도 있어요. If you put it on your eye right after you do this, then you might get burnt. 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : 사랑스러움 가득! 봄 메이크업♥ (feat. 봄 신제품)
vlive.english: If you put it on your eye right after you do this, then you might get burnt.

examples.korean: He did not feel up to braving the journalists at the airport. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 공항에서 기자들과 용감히 대면할 수 있을 것 같지가 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He did not feel up to braving the journalists at the airport. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The two have never met face to face before. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 두 사람이 전에 한 번도 대면한 적이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The two have never met face to face before. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was at an early age brought face to face with the horrors of war. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 어린 나이에 전쟁의 공포와 대면하게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was at an early age brought face to face with the horrors of war. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I deal with customers on the phone and rarely meet them face-to-face. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 전화로 손님들을 상대하고 직접 대면하는 경우는 드물다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I deal with customers on the phone and rarely meet them face-to-face. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was not able to face the prosecution. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 검찰측과 대면할 수 없었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: He was not able to face the prosecution. Add to Wordbook
